attributes.action: Increase the number of COVID-19 test performed in UK.
attributes.additional_details: UK people health conditions should be a priority for the Government and parliament. Please help us to raise concerns.
attributes.background: The government and parliament should increase the number of test performed in UK. I have been checked all the tests executed in the last weeks and, on average, we have less than 6K tests done per day. Moreover, the number of positive tests are increasing, this approach is not suitable anymore

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
Find out more and watch the Committee put questions suggested by petitioners to Government Ministers and the Deputy Chief Medical Officer: 

https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/news/145767/committee-question-deputy-chief-medical-officer-and-ministers-on-coronavirus-response/

Read letters asking further questions of Government Ministers:

https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/publications/3/correspondence/
